item.title: First impression of DjangoX and Cookiecutter Django
item.author: shuuji3@gmail.com (TAKAHASHI Shuuji)
item.description: I searched Django nice project templates I can use to make a simple personal project. There are two Django project templates I’m interested in: Cookiecutter Django and DjangoX. This is my first impression of those project templates.
